sentences.sentence: They're all groaning about soaring health budgets, the fastest-growing component of which are pharmaceutical costs.
sentences.translation: 他们都在抱怨飞速上涨的医疗预算，其中增长最快的部分是药品成本。

sentences.sentence: They're all groaning about soaring health budgets, the fastest-growing component of which are pharmaceutical costs.
sentences.translation: 他们都在抱怨飞涨的医疗预算，其中增长最快的部分是药品成本。

sentences.sentence: It unties the hands of the pharmaceutical industry so that they can begin treating the disease and not just the side effects.
sentences.translation: 这为制药行业松绑，这样，他们就可以开始治疗这种疾病，而不仅仅是治疗疾病的副作用。
